block.p: The Q&A column on June 3 about reimbursement options when a tour falls through misstated a recommendation about when to buy insurance policies that cover full refunds. Vikki Corliss, a spokeswoman at InsureMyTrip.com, a travel insurance comparison site, said that it is best to buy coverage before or within 7 to 21 days (varies by plan) after you have made your first deposit on the tour; she did not say within 7 to 12 days.
